item.description:
Come join us for our monthly meeting. New members and guests welcome! [color=red]Social hour 530 pm to 630 pm[/color]. Grab a bite to eat and meet many of the New England Thunder women. Meeting begins at[color=red] 630 pm[/color].

 

Special Guest Speaker- August 8

Betsy Lister from Lister Insurance Agency will be at the meeting to discuss our motorcycle insurance.

Betsy has spoken to our group before and converted many of us to Progressive Insurance which has better coverage and saved us all money............... yet increased our coverage as well at a lower price.

Plus Progressive has many benefits that other insurance companies do not offer.....the most important of which is towing. One call to Progressive and they call a tow truck for you! (I have had to use this feature several times and am so grateful I have this coverage.)

******She does require that you bring a copy of your coverage from your existing insurance so you can compare yours to what she suggests that you have.

Betsy is a very active and highly regarded woman in the motorcycle community and last year was inducted into the Motorcycle Hall of Fame at the Sturgis Rally.

She can also handle your other insurance needs for auto and home and often get a better rate by bundling your policies. Or you may just want to move you motorcycle to Progressive as I have. She will work with you to see if she can get better rates if you want her to.

This meeting could be very important to you financially and you will probably be able to save $$$$$$$. So please plan to attend for your own benefit! Those of us who are already using her are very happy with our policies and the costs of the policies.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Monthly Meeting
